description:
Do you want to pursue an exciting career in Banking and Finance, Do you aspire to be an Investment Banker, Trader or Broker, or do you just want to know more about where your money goes and what happens to it when you buy or sell shares? Well, the trade life cycle is one of the most important aspects of Banking. If you've ever wondered what goes on when you initiate a trade (when you buy or sell shares or stocks) then this course, the Securities Trade Life Cycle, can walk you through step-by-step of what happens from the front to the back end of a trade.

You should take this course because the securities trade life cycle is an important aspect of trading, and whether you are interested in a career in banking and finance, or just want to know more about what happens behind the scenes of a bank, then this comprehensive course will outline the major steps in the trade life cycle, including:

  • Market Participants
    - who, what, when and where
  • Trade Execution and Trade Capture
    -what happens when a trade is executed and what happens to the buy and sell side
  • Trade Enrichment and Validation
    -how trades are monitored and regualted
  • Trade Agreement and Transaction Reporting
    -when trades are agreed by both the buy and sell- side, also how is this documented
  • Trade Settlement and Custodians
    -what is a custodian, how is a trade finalised
  • Settlements
    -finalising a trade
  • Position and Trade Related Operations
    -other operations at the custodian and trade positions
title: Investment Banking Operations : Securities Trade Life Cycle
